system.effect: Prerequisites: Iron Fist Ability 1 AP â€“ Free Action Trigger: You hit a foe with a Move affected by Iron Fist Effect: You Tag the triggering foe and gain a +1 bonus to your Accuracy Rolls and Evasion against that foe. Each subsequent time that you hit the Tagged foe with a Move affected by Iron Fist, this bonus increases by +1, to a maximum of your Combat Rank. If you ever spend a turn without successfully hitting your Tagged foe, the foe loses their Tag and the bonus is lost.
